headline: Chargeflow Raises $35M Series A to Scale AI-Powered Chargeback Automation Platform for Global Enterprise Merchants
summary: Chargeflow, the leading AI-powered chargeback automation platform, today announced a $35 million Series A funding round — including a $10 million debt facility, led by Viola Growth, with participation by existing investors OpenView Venture Partners, bringing the company's total funding to $49 million.

headline: Mastercard | 'Mobilizing for Impact': How Southeast Asia Is Rising Together

headline: Mastercard Picks Polygon to Bring Verified Usernames to Self-Custody Wallets
summary: Move introduces verified aliases for crypto transfers and adds an ID layer to self-custody tools.
